titles.title: A bill to enable the Secretary of Health and Human Services to carry out activities to reduce waste and fraud under the medicare program.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9989)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 7/30/1993--Introduced. Makes additional appropriations to the Secretary of Health and Human Services for peer review activities and activities to reduce waste and fraud under the Medicare program under title XVIII of the Social Security Act.
